Articles.Content:
So recently i was messing around with some aircraft near runway 110011 (included in kerbin side)

However whilst doing so i saw something in the distance.

Upon flying closer i realized that it was a pyramid. This pyramid is not the known one as it has no kerbal statue in front of it. 

This pyramid is much taller  and is next to a small body of water. It also has a entrance (albeit it goes nowhere)

This pyramid may have been added by kerbin side but it could exists in base KSP.

Here are some coords: 10 55 49 N and 127 37 47 W

Flying to these choords should take you to the pyramid. Also if you have kerbin side i suggest you launch from area 110011 as they are quite close.

If you fly out there without kerbin side and the pyramid is not there then that means its added by kerbin side.

But agine: It COULD be part of base KSP.

Thanks for reading this thread. If your a good pilot then i would request if you can fly out there in base KSP and test my theory.

Grabbed the co-ords. I'll check it out tomorrow, I was flying around that area anyway. Will report back soon.
This has been confirmed multiple times as part of Kerbinside, no need to check
Yep, saw a post about this maybe a year ago? It's part of kerbinside

Hmm wonder what else kerbinside adds...

Time to comb the entire planet with kerbnet...

Time to comb the entire planet with kerbnet...

Not a pyramid, but look for this:

It's beautiful, going to send a sub here.

I love treasurehunts

Edited April 14, 2017 by Triop

On 4/13/2017 at 2:47 PM, Avery616 said:

So recently i was messing around with some aircraft near runway 110011 (included in kerbin side)

 

110011 in binary is 51 in decimal.  Gotta love that.
I think Kerbinside adds three anomalies, the pyramid and two others. If you place a static you can see the three.(Not locations) kerbinside data files may reveal location. (or @AlphaAsh might.)
I found a large desert temple, a stargate, and a satellite dish, all in the editor.

3 minutes ago, Brent Kerman said:

Coordinates, Please!

when i found them in the editor i tried to manipulate it to show me the locations of them. However this broke my KSP. The desert temple and stargate looked like they could be in the desert due to there texture base.
